byline.contributor: Niraj Chokshi and Malachy Browne contributed reporting.
byline.original: By CAITLIN DICKERSON and STEPHANIE SAUL

headline.print_headline: Hostile Acts Against Minorities, Often Invoking Trump, Erupt Across U.S.
headline.main: Campuses Confront Hostile Acts Against Minorities After Donald Trump’s Election

snippet: Several episodes suggest that the election of Donald J. Trump is provoking a backlash against efforts to promote cultural diversity on campuses....
lead_paragraph: Several episodes suggest that the election of Donald J. Trump is provoking a backlash against efforts to promote cultural diversity on campuses.
